result.eng: On Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ga: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.orig: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.html: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċoṁairle Ṫomáis aontaíoḋ gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.

result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: He takes his advice from the generals in Moscow.
result.ga: Bíonn seiseann i gcomhairle leis na ginearáil i Moscó
result.orig: Bíonn seiseann i gcomhairle leis na ginearáil i Moscó
result.html: Bíonn seiseann i gcomhairle leis na ginearáil i MoscóHe takes his advice from the generals in Moscow.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn seiseann i gcoṁairle leis na ginearáil i MoscóHe takes his advice from the generals in Moscow.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: She asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ga: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.orig: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.html: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sí an ċeist i gcoṁairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.

result.eng: She gave good advice to the girls.
result.ga: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíní
result.orig: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíní
result.html: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíníShe gave good advice to the girls.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sí coṁairle ṁaiṫ ar na cailíníShe gave good advice to the girls.

result.eng: Take my advice and beware of this man!
result.ga: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.orig: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.html: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!
result.ponchtml: Glacaigí mo ċoṁairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!

result.eng: I am a widow and I do what I like.
result.ga: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féin
result.html: Is baintreach mise agus bím ar mo chomhairle féinI am a widow and I do what I like.
result.ponchtml: Is baintreaċ mise agus bím ar mo ċoṁairle féinI am a widow and I do what I like.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: If you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ga: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.orig: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.html: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ponchtml: Má ṁaiṫeann tú dom é ní raċaiḋ mé ṫar do ċoṁairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.

result.eng: You should talk to your parents about it.
result.ga: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.html: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobhYou should talk to your parents about it.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór duit dul i gcoṁairle le do ṫuismiṫeoirí ina ṫaoḃYou should talk to your parents about it.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.html: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.eng: She does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ga: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.orig: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aici
result.html: Níl an Ghaeilge ar a comhairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.
result.ponchtml: Níl an Ġaeilge ar a coṁairle féin aiciShe does not have a good command of Irish.

result.eng: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ga: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.orig: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.html: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ponchtml: Pléaḋ an ċeist ag cruinniú na coṁairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.

result.eng: I made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ga: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.orig: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.html: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé gearán leis an Ċoṁairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.

result.eng: She has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ga: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.orig: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.html: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí coṁairle an-ċiallṁar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.

result.eng: They give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ga: Tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste
result.orig: Tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste
result.html: Tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páisteThey give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ponchtml: Tugann siad coṁairle do ċailíní a ḃíonn ag súil le páisteThey give advice to girls who are expecting a child.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: You know what my advice to you is?
result.ga: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.orig: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.html: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
result.ponchtml: 'Ḃfuil a ḟios agat goidé mo ċoṁairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?

result.eng: I am beyond advice now.
result.ga: Tá mé thar chomhairle anois
result.orig: Tá mé thar chomhairle anois
result.html: Tá mé thar chomhairle anoisI am beyond advice now.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ṫar ċoṁairle anoisI am beyond advice now.
